name: MAHEZ EDUCATION SOCIETY DHARWAD

address: CB - 5,  ANJUMAN NEW COMPLEX, CELLAR FLOOR

briefDescription: Mahez Education Society (R), Dharwad. is a  Non-Governmental Organisation established in 2004.  Registration No. 54/2004-05. under Societies Registration Act 1960. Mahez Education society is a Socio-Economic Association established an aim to improve the Social, Economic and mental condition of the women at grass root level, since these  10  years we are voluntary without any help are conducting Health, Community development, Physically handicappd children school, Educational, and Vocational programmes in Urban and Rural areas.  As an organization with social concern Mahez Education Society has embarked upon a programme to educate the poor women.  The poor women face triple trouble of class, caste and gender.
